  • Top Diameter: 5.25"
  • Base Diameter: 5"
  • All sizes are approximate measurements

      [Information]

      Create an absolutely stunning table decoration with these crystal clear plastic decorative Candle Holders. Glossy plastic finish coupled with slim sleek stem and fascinating cylinder shape will impart a regal charm to your tabletops. Exceptionally clear plastic construction will showcase your beautiful craft creations elegantly, providing a bedazzling spectacle for your guests to behold. The Candle Holder is wide enough to hold natural or artificial candles, corsages, or carnations in the most magical manner.

      For a perfectly exotic look, place these Candle Holders atop our decorative mirrors and scatter votive candles, LEDs and silk rose petals around. Celebrate your merry moments with heavenly radiance and ecstatic glee by decorating with our spectacular crystal clear tall decorative cups. You can use these voguish cups as swish centerpieces to decorate your party ambiance, or can fill these with tasteful treats, party favors and candies with a tulle circle and ribbon bow adornment to simply WOW your guests and invitees

      • One set includes:1 x Cup+1 x Stem+1 x Base
      • You would receive total 4 sets/order

      Additional Information:

      • Qty: 4 Sets per order
      • 1 Set: 1 Cup+1 Stem+1 Base
      • Material: Plastic
      • Color: Clear
      • Height: 18"
      • Uses : Wedding, Party, Birthday, Event, Table and Centerpieces Decoration

entry.title: 10FT Dual Cross Bar Backdrop Stand, DIY Adjustable Heavy Duty Background Support Stand
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3630
Type: Backdrops
Price: 209.99

[About]

Includes:

  • 10ft. Heavy Duty Backdrop Stand with Weighted Base:
  • 2 Stand Bases
  • 2 Adjustable Height Support Stands; 5ft.(shortest) to 10ft.(longest)
  • 1 Adjustable Width Telescopic Cross Bars; 4ft.(shortest) to 10ft.(longest)
  • 2x Cross Bar Mounting Brackets
  • 2x Adjustable Width Telescopic Cross Bars 5ft.(shortest) to 10ft.(longest)
    		•
    Material: Metal
    Color: Black
    Backdrop Stand Size: 10FT x 10FT
    Stand Base Size: 18" long x 18" wide x 3/16" thick
    Mounting Bracket Size: 9"W X 3.25"H X 1"L
    Capacity: Can take up to 50lbs
    2 in 1 Stand: Easily convert to Dual Crossbar Stand using additional crossbars and mounting brackets
    Professional Dual Crossbar Backdrop Stand for photography, sturdy and durable
    Perfect for hanging multiple backgrounds at one time.
    All sizes are approximate measurements
    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

     

    [Information]

    Additional Information:

    Backdrop Stand:

    • Cross bar locking system at top of 2 support stands
    • Cross bar diameter: 3cm Longest end
    • Each support stand comes with 1 height adjustable lever
    • How to set up:
      • Connect the support stand to the base
      • Insert the adjustable width telescopic cross bar on top of the stand
      • To Tighten: Turn Knob RIGHT
      • To Loosen: Turn Knob LEFT

    2x Cross Bar Mounting Brackets:

    • 3 Wingnuts and screws on each bracket: 1.25"W X 0.5"H

    2x Adjustable Width Telescopic Cross Bars 5FT (smallest) to 10FT (longest):

    • Total Number of poles: 8
    • Pole Diameter: 1"
    • 2x Pole A: 30"L
    • 4x Pole B: 32"L
    • 2x Pole D: 32"L
    • Assembly: To get 10FT long poles, you need to connect: A+B+B+D.

    Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Photography, Exhibition Decoration

    Note: The cross bar for BKDP_STND07 does NOT fit on the middle part of the accessory / mounting bracket. Can use maximum 2 cross bars at a time.

[Information] 

Display Crystal Beaded Columns

Romans ruled the world for a long time and left unsurpassable assets for the entire world to cherish and benefit from, most important of which being architectural splendidness. Roman pedestal columns and pillars have never left their gloriousness and firm supremacy in contemporary construction; major European and American structures are the epitome of Roman inspiration. 

Decorative Columns

Our Roman Doric columns are specially designed with high quality plastic to bring the glorious touch of Roman architecture into your special events, imparting a Grand imperial touch to your decorations. 

Multipurpose & Versatile

Let these columns stand tall by your passage way or stage side, reminding of the past, decorate with our ivy garlands, pearl flowers, glitter accented leaves, ribbons, bows, or LEDs. Glam your events venue up with these triumphant columns standing proud, bedazzling your guests with their exultancy!

 

Additional Information: 

  • Can Hold Weight Upto: 20-25 LBS ( Max.)
  • Extra glue and crystals are included
  • Rubber Weights added at the Bottom for Stability. Can also put sandbags inside the columns to stabilize it
  • Pedestal column pots come with Mirror Mosaic and studded with 10mm Crystal Beads. Additional decorations not included.
  • Uses: Floral Arrangements, Wedding Decor, Aisle Decor, Indoor & Outdoor Designs, Artworks, Stage Props, Wedding Ceremonies, Photography Props, Backdrops Ideas, Landscapes, and DIY Background Designing.

Flower Plant Stand Pots

Place natural plants and flowers in these pots or decorate with our disposable garlands, ivies, roses, daisies, Manzanita Trees, ribbons and other accessories to impart a completely enchanting look to your decoration. Multipurpose & Versatile

Crystal Beaded Columns

Take your decoration and accent to the next level with our splendid selection of Italian-inspired contemporary style flower pedestal column pots, columns, and pillars. Made from premium quality PVC material, these intricately crafted and styled props can withstand any heavy-duty usage. A perfect blend of vintage Italian architecture and modern design, these stylish flower pots will bring a chic Italian twist to your party or wedding ambiance.

Italian Inspired Flower Pots

Brilliantly decorated with reflecting mosaic mirrors and glittering crystal beads, our beautifully fashioned Italian-style flower pots will transform your ordinary and dull party space into a luminous and vibrant realm of festive glee. Use these on their own to glam your event up or top them upon our Italian-style decorative columns to create a bedazzling spectacle of lofty extravaganza.

Multipurpose & Versatile

Fill with fresh seasonal flowers and bushes or our artificial flowers, Ivies, bushes, and stems to indulge your guests in a refreshing and rejuvenating celebratory experience. Place these pots by your passage way or stage side, reminding of the glorious past, while colorful flowers and plants contrast with them, bringing an innovation of the present time. Revive your guest's spirits and festive mood with these pretty pots bedazzling them with their exultant radiance!

entry.title: 20FT x 10FT Royal Blue Metallic Shiny Spandex Glittering Backdrop
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3110
Type: Backdrops
Price: 69.99 - 188.97 (2 variants)

[About]

Material: Metallic Spandex
Color: Royal Blue
Edges: Serged
Size: 20ft. wide x 10ft. high
Size of Rod Pocket: 3"
Perfect for room divider, paired with our backdrop stands.
All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings, the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Pure piece of elegance! Our premium quality spandex backdrop linens are made from high quality spandex material that is highly durable, stretchable, and affordable. These extravagant backdrops can be used time and time again, without any need for ironing and can easily be laundered countless times without losing their luster and charm. The peerless glint of metallic hue coupled with the seamless luster of spandex material will exude oodles of imperial sheen and regal appeal to your party space.  Create a perfectly bedazzling duet of luminosity and glamour by complementing these glimmering spandex backdrops with spandex chair covers and caps, spandex tablecloths, spandex table runners, and other accessories in wedding, showers, banquet events, corporate affairs, quinceanera parties etc. Their stain resistant and wrinkle resistant properties make them a perfect choice for indoor and outdoor events, holiday parties, weddings and other festive celebrations where you desire to create an everlasting impression on your guests while still staying in budget.


Additional Information:

  • Material: Metallic Spandex
  • Size: 20ft wide x 10 ft height 
  • Edges: Serged 
  • Color: Royal Blue
  • Size of Rod Pocket: 3 Inches
  • How to Care: Machine Washable, Tumble Dry, Low Heat
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Photography, Exhibition Decoration
  • Note: Sale is for 1-pc backdrop linen only. Flowers, candelabra , other decorative items or additional fabric bolts NOT INCLUDED.

[Information]

Pure piece of elegance! Our premium quality spandex backdrop linens are made from high quality spandex material that is highly durable, stretchable, and affordable. These extravagant backdrops can be used time and time again, without any need for ironing and can easily be laundered countless times without losing their luster and charm. The peerless glint of metallic hue coupled with the seamless luster of spandex material will exude oodles of imperial sheen and regal appeal to your party space.  Create a perfectly bedazzling duet of luminosity and glamour by complementing these glimmering spandex backdrops with spandex chair covers and caps, spandex tablecloths, spandex table runners, and other accessories in wedding, showers, banquet events, corporate affairs, quinceanera parties etc. Their stain resistant and wrinkle resistant properties make them a perfect choice for indoor and outdoor events, holiday parties, weddings and other festive celebrations where you desire to create an everlasting impression on your guests while still staying in budget.


Additional Information:

  • Material: Metallic Spandex
  • Size: 20ft wide x 10 ft height 
  • Edges: Serged 
  • Color: Navy Blue
  • Size of Rod Pocket: 3 Inches
  • How to Care: Machine Washable, Tumble Dry, Low Heat

entry.title: 5FT x 9FT | Clear Portable Isolation Wall Kit, Floor Standing Sneeze Guard
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Backdrops
Price: 144.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Set Table Divider

Item Includes:

  • 1 Custom Adjustable Backdrop Stand With Steel Base
  • 6 Backdrop Clamps
  • 1 Vinyl Drape

Backdrop Stand

  • Size: Adjustable, Max 10ftx10ft
  • Material: Metal
  • Comes With:
    • 2 Stand Bases: 18" long x 18" wide x 3/16" thick
    • 2 Adjustable Height Support Stands: 5FT (smallest) to 10FT (longest)
    • 1 Adjustable Width Telescopic Cross Bars: 4FT (smallest) to 10FT (longest)
    • Pole Diameter: 1.25"
    • Cross Bar Diameter: 3cm Largest end

Backdrop Clamps:

  • Total Clamps: 6 Pcs
  • Material: Heavy Duty Plastic
  • Clip Size: 4.5" Long x 2" Wide
  • Movable tips for maximum fit and tension

    Vinyl Drape:

    • Size: 9FT Long x 5 FT Wide
    • Thickness: 10 Mil
    • Serged Edge: 4 mm
    Simple Set-Up, Easy To Assemble
    Note: This Isolation Wall Kit Combo is for size 5FT Wide x 9FT High
    There will be 3.5 FT of space from the Bottom. Can adjust to preference
    All sizes are approximate measurements
    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

     

    [Information]

     

    Isolation Partition Walls

    As we are adapting to the new normal and carry on with the reopening process of businesses, educational institutions as well as continuation of events and festivities, it has become necessary to adhere to safety measures and social distancing rules for the safety of our guests, employees, customers, or students. Isolation Partition Walls, Dividing Partitions, or Sneeze Guards are the ideal solution for events and businesses that are required to follow social distancing protocols. This backdrop divider is freestanding, portable, easy to assemble, and give your guests, customers, and employees the protection they need.

    Social Distancing Divider

    Our Social Distancing Divider comes with an adjustable telescopic stand that can be adjusted as per your needs, a transparent vinyl sheet to ensure unhindered communication yet unsurpassed protection and clamps to keep sheet firmly at place. With a super wide 10 ft. width, this kit spans significantly longer than its Plexiglas and acrylic substitutes, while is a fraction of cost. Our Portable Partition Kit is ideal for both indoor and outdoor functions, small and large gatherings, weddings, holiday parties, and even for corporate events.

    		   

    Versatile and Multifunctional

    Versatile and multifunctional, these freestanding units can be used individually or connected to make wider partitions, walls or other structures like cubes or L-shapes. They can be used to separate tables or desks, sitting arrangements, perfect for plastic workout cubes at gym, isolate teachers from students, or as a way to create directional queuing in passages or hallways. Ensuring maximum protection, these Social Distancing Clear Vinyl Dividers are reusable as vinyl sheets can be washed or wiped down easily.

     


    Additional Information:

    • Backdrop Stand
      • Capacity: 25 lbs max
      • Total Weight: 34.58 lbs
      • Cross bar locking system at top of 2 support stands
      • How to set up:
        • Connect the support stand to the base
        • Insert the adjustable width telescopic cross bar on top of the stand
        • To Tighten: Turn Knob RIGHT
        • To Loosen: Turn Knob LEFT
    • Backdrop Clamps
      • Strong metal spring applies consistent pressure
      • Easy to use and re-position
    • Vinyl Protector
      • Thickness: 10 Mil
      • Serged Edge: 4 mm
      • Features: Reusable, Eco Friendly, Waterproof
    • Uses: Offices, Schools, Gyms, Restaurants, Hair & Nail Salons, Casinos, Churches, and many other businesses and organizations.

entry.title: 8FT Tall - Gold Triangular Metal Wedding Arch, Photo Booth Backdrop Stand
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3630
Type: Backdrops
Price: 124.99

[About]

1 Qty: 1 Triangle Metal Wedding Arch

What You Get:

  • (2x) Base Legs
  • (4x) Side Bars
  • (1x) Top V Bar
  • 1 Pack of Accessories: Each pack has 24 Washers, 12 Screws, 12 Wing Nuts
  • Assembly Instruction
Material: Metal
Color: Gold
Overall Height: 8 Ft
Overall Width: 64"
Capacity: 100 Lbs
Assembly Required: Yes
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]


Additional Information:

  • Each Base Leg Size: 23" L x 1.5" W x 9.5"H x 2.5" Thickness
  • Total number of Base Legs: 2pcs
  • Each Side Bar Size: 42" L x 1.5" W x 1.5" Thickness
  • Total number of Side Bars: 4pcs
  • Top V Bar Size: 10" L x 7" W x 1" Thickness
  • (12x) Screws: 1.5" L x 0.25" W
  • (12x) Wing Nuts: 0.5" L x 1" W ( Make sure that the diameter of the nut fit the diameter of the screws. These help secure the screws in to give security to the frame of the item )
  • (24x) Washers: Outer Diameter: 0.5", Inner Diameter: 0.25"
  • It is easy to assemble and disassemble.
  • Arch consists of separate pieces, very comfortable to store and take so little space
  • The arch design is made very carefully, you can easily fix flowers, led lights and decorative elements on it.
  • Perfect for weddings, birthdays, bridal shows and photo sessions.

Note:

  • 2 People are recommended to assemble.
  • Screwdriver is not included.
  • Additional decorations such as flowers, drapes and accessories are not included.

FAQ:

1. Can this be taken numerous times and broken down, will it fit a four door car - Yes
2. Will it hold a climbing plant - Yes
3. Could this arch be used as trellies for real roses in the garden - A trellies is technically a support for a rose vines/climbing vines.
4. Can it stand on it's own or do you have stake in the ground - Yes, it can stand on it's own.
5. How many pieces does it break down into - Seven (7)
6. How sturdy this arch is - It is sturdy enough to hold floral items.
7. How you do stabilize the arch - Arch is stable on it's own as long as the screws that keep it together are secured and tight, if it needs more reinforcement, can use sand bags on each end attached to the base to balance and further reinforce the back drop.
